content.question: Which of the following does the author use as evidence for the argument that the Reformation was a series of parallel movements?

choices.label: The attack on Martin Luther by the pope and other church leaders
Luther’s threat to “the Pope’s crown and the monks’ bellies”
The blending of religious reformers’ protests with those of laymen
The high status of the scholars who started the Reformation

content.answer: The blending of religious reformers’ protests with those of laymen

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify the evidence used in a source to support an argument.
